word: G5299 - ὑπωπιάζω - hypōpiázō - hoop-o-pee-ad'-zo - Keep under

sections.paragraph: 1. that part of the face which is under the eyes
2. a blow in that part of the face; a black and blue spot, a bruise, to keep down, keep in subjection

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a compound of G5259 and a derivative of G3700; to hit under the eye (buffet or disable an antagonist as a pugilist), that is, (figuratively) to tease or annoy (into compliance), subdue (one’s passions): - keep under, weary.
